title: 77 - Carpool Diem
description: In the wake of Lou Reed's passing, in which this episode is dedicated to; a sad, stripped down, sleepy and introspective Velvet Harmontown. Plus, the introduction of Harmontown's new character "Johnny Jackhammer." In DnD, the gang is helpless to watch ...
lastTitle: 76 - Hug Me, Hug Me, Hug Me
